heading: Research
description: Through SWOT analysis, we will assess the strategies of your top-performing competitors. This evaluation will help us identify how to leverage their strengths and weaknesses to your advantage

detail.title: UX research
detail.des: This serves as the launchpad for every project. We analyze your current product, competitors, and target market, then integrate these insights to develop a site map and a list of actionable UX features.
detail.deliverables: Site map . Key findings for UX improvements . SWOT analysis

detail.title: UX strategy
detail.des: The scope of a UX strategy can encompass a single product, service, or feature, as well as multiple products and services. A strong strategy ensures that user-centered insights are woven into the overall business plan.
detail.deliverables: Plan of action designed to deliver improved UX over an established timeframe.

heading: Experience design
description: Transform the analysis results into user-friendly pages and blocks that adhere to established usability principles, effectively converting visitors into customers.

detail.title: Wireframes
detail.des: This stage allows us to grasp the logic and structure of the future service. We develop and finalize prototypes for each individual flow.
detail.deliverables: Our UX/UI design agency specializes in developing wireframe prototypes to ensure a clear understanding of the future service's logic and structure.

detail.title: Clickable prototypes
detail.des: By using a clickable prototype, we can showcase and test how the website will function in near-realistic conditions.
detail.deliverables: Action plan designed to deliver improved UX over an established timeframe.

heading: Interface design
description: This is where the magic happens. We begin with a mood board and design concept for the future design. From there, we create the UI design for the entire project and develop a UI kit or design system for the developers.

detail.title: Moodboard
detail.des: To establish the visual direction and style of the interface, our team creates mood boards and collaborates with the client. This approach enables you to select the most suitable solution early on, helping to avoid extensive revisions later in the design phase that can be time-consuming.
detail.deliverables: Moodboard to choose the suitable visual direction.

detail.title: Design Conception
detail.des: Building on the research and the direction established in the mood boards, we develop the initial visual concept of the site to showcase the selected style in realistic conditions before finalizing the UI design.
detail.deliverables: The design concept that helps to establish the visual direction.

detail.title: Mockup design
detail.des: After gathering all previous work, we begin crafting the actual UI design, integrating aesthetic and graphic elements like illustrations and motion. These components, soon to be realized, are systematically validated with customers at each step.

detail.title: Delivery
detail.des: Once the UI design for the entire project is complete, we create a UI kit for developers and prepare for implementation to bring the project to life.
detail.deliverables: Developer Handoff file for development with UI Kit

heading: Development
description: The development team maintains constant communication with the designers, enabling us to proactively prevent potential problems and swiftly address any existing issues.

detail.title: No-code development
detail.des: Discover a highly optimized, easily implementable solution to quickly launch your website or create an MVP version of your product with minimal resource investment.

detail.title: Web App development
detail.des: In custom code, the possibilities are limitless when the implementation delivers business value. We help identify unique custom solutions and provide simpler yet equally effective alternatives, drawing on our extensive experience.

detail.title: Mobile app development
detail.des: We offer cross-platform mobile development services to build high-quality, feature-rich apps that work seamlessly. We guarante experienced team, custom solutions, user-friendly design, and comprehensive testing.
